cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 14th APRIL, 1918.1* With the exception of a small attack on the 1st Australian Division this morning, which was easily repulsed^ no further attacks have developed to-day, and the situation Is more satisfactory.2* On the remainder of the front there is no change oGeneral Staff,War Office, S0W.l. 14th April. 1918.Issued at 6 p.ra*
